title.abbrev: Privacy and Accuracy in NIC Databases

front.title: Privacy and Accuracy Issues in Network Information Center Databases

author.organization: SRI International, Network Information Systems Center

abstract.t: This document provides a set of guidelines for the administration and operation of public Network Information Center (NIC) databases. The purpose is to formalize procedures for the responsible handling of the personal and organizational information maintained by NICs in publically accessible databases, and to improve the accuracy and accessibility of such data where appropriate.
